definition: to follow the crowd/to conform
surname Cong

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
many/numerous/crowd/multitude
variant of 眾|众[zhong4]
(Internet slang) huge crowds of people (emphatic form of 人[ren2])

sentences.english: Conformity is not in itself a good or a bad thing.
sentences.chinese: 从众本身无所谓是好是坏。

sentences.english: Therarity bias is also sometimes called a" nonconformist bias".
sentences.chinese: 罕见稀有偏好有时也被称为“非从众偏好”。

sentences.english: When faced with an authority figure mere conformity can be transformed into obedience.
sentences.chinese: 当面对权威人物时，仅仅的从众心理将会转变为服从。

sentences.english: Jump on the bandwagon, if for no other reason than to improve your bottom line.
sentences.chinese: 如果想要提升你的底线，就跳出那些从众心理吧。

sentences.english: Most humans have a natural tendency to follow.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人天生地倾向于从众。

sentences.english: Dress cute wherever you go, life is too short to blend in - Paris Hilton
sentences.chinese: 无论到哪儿都要打扮俏丽，生命短暂，何苦从众。

sentences.english: Herd mentality explains why fads get so popular.
sentences.chinese: 从众效应解释了时尚会流行原因。

definition: to follow the crowd/going with the tide
to follow blindly/to conform slavishly/unthinking obedience
to say what everyone says (idiom)/to conform to what one perceives to be the majority view/to follow the herd
to drift with the waves and go with the flow (idiom); to follow the crowd blindly
to reveal one's talent (idiom)/to rise above others/to distinguish oneself
to follow/(of a woman) to get married/(old) attendant
head of grain/husk/tip/point/clever/gifted/outstanding
to go with the tide/to blindly follow the crowd/to follow the trend
to compete to be first/to contest first place
vanity
lit. first impression is strongest
not following the crowd/to go against the tide
blind/blindly/ignorant/lacking understanding
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
to lack foresight
reason/rationality/rational
